column4: Hi, I had a question. I  was considering installing Ubuntu today and downloaded and burned the ISO. While I was booting from the CD, a couple of the bullets didn't read OK as it was loading.  Does this mean that some of my hardware will not be detected if I choose to install.  Everything seemed to work fine when it finally booted up however.
it is likely that those bullets didn't load ok because those aren'T available as you load from cd
to install macromeida flash you are better off using automatix
an installer for propiratary stuff like  flash ...
